script.dialog: Young Zaraden, This Unit has detected unusually high levels of stress from your heartbeat.
This Unit is programmed to provide assistance.|!||L|Would you like any assistance?
This Unit is awaiting a response.
...Oh,   are you talking to me?
That is correct.
I am      looking for someone.     |L|I think.
Have you seen another Zaraden around here?
This Unit has not seen another Zaraden today. However, This Unit has seen many Zaraden before.
This Unit may be able to assist in searching for the requested Zaraden.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Describe the color of the Zaraden's hair and skin.
Let's see.   Her hair was...
Oh!    Her hair was...   red?
Her skin was...    a red looking color.
Scans have detected an abnormality in the eyes of this young Zaraden.
I      can't see colors.
This Unit would like to apologize.   Perhaps This Unit can assist in some other way.
Well,   the other day, I was hiding from one of those monsters.|L||!|I thought it was going to find me.
Then my heart just started shooting a bunch of |shake|nonsense|norm| at it!
THEN she stopped trying to kill me and gave me something!
She just wanted to be around me all day after that.
But the next day she was gone...|L||!|I can't seem to remember what she gave me.
Can you explain what that was?
This Unit has acquired information to assist you.
This Unit has determined that you have just experienced love.
So that's what that is!
The mechanism by which the monsters and Zaraden forget each other is unknown to This Unit.
However, loving the forgetful monsters seems like a better alternative to living in fear of them.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Continue loving the monsters.
That's a good idea.
This Unit has detected some peculiarities with your heart.
Your love bullets are of the |C12||I12|Void element.
However, your |C3|charged attacks|C0| appear to be of the |C11||I11|Radiant element.
All monsters have weaknesses and resistances to certain |C3|love elements.
|C3|Example:|C0| Most |C3|Veyeral|C0| monsters are resistant to |C12||I12|Void love,|C0| but they are vulnerable to |C11||I11|Radiant love.
Even without any energy, your |C3|charged shots|C0| may be more effective in this case.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Use the appropriate ability in order to love the monster in an efficient manner.
|wave|Thank you so much, Love Robot.
I was a little afraid to talk to you at first.
But now I'm glad I did.
This Unit is feeling immense joy for the young Zaraden.
I'll pass that feeling on to the monsters.
